    • Uses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation

      Subclasses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StorageOperationDefault
      This implementations uses, when its StorageFile is located in a remote host, a OperationSynchronizer in order to synchronize this storage operation with the network operation.
      When a remote job is needed, it is created under a new VM or, if the remote host is a ThinClient, using its main vm.

    • Uses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.service.checkpointing

      Subclasses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.service.checkpointing 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CheckpointingHandlerAbstract<E extends RunnableEntity,C extends Checkpoint<E,?>>
      This is an abstract implementation of the CheckpointingHandler which keeps one checkpoint per registered entity and updates it automatically.
      This implementation will also automatically recover a registered RunnableEntity whenever it fails.
      Additionally, if any parent of the MemoryZone (e.g.
      class  VmCheckpointingHandlerAbstract
      This implementation defines a CheckpointingHandlerAbstract which uses the parent CloudProvider policies to select a Storage where to place checkpoints, and to select a host to use for recovered VirtualMachines.
      class  VmCheckpointingHandlerDefault
      This implementation relies on its configuration.
      Following configuration values can be set: Interval in Simulator.SECOND.

    • Uses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.service.jobplacement

      Subclasses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.service.jobplacement 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JobPlacementPolicyAbstract 
      class  JobPlacementPolicyBestFit
      A placement policy that chooses the vm that has enough resources for the job among all given user's vms.
      The vm is chosen according to the best fit method.
      class  JobPlacementPolicyFirstFit
      A placement policy that chooses the vm that has enough resources for the job among all given user's vms.
      The vm is chosen according to the first fit method.
      class  JobPlacementPolicyRandomFit
      A placement policy that chooses the vm that has enough resources for the job among all given user's vms.
      The vm is chosen according to the random fit method.
      class  JobPlacementPolicyWorstFit
      A placement policy that chooses the vm that has enough resources for the job among all given user's vms.
      The vm is chosen according to the worst fit method.

      The storage is chosen according to the best fit method.
      class  SfPlacementPolicyFirstFit
      A placement policy that chooses the storage that has enough capacity for the storage file.
      The storage is chosen according to the first fit method.

      A placement policy that chooses the storage that has enough capacity for the storage file.
      The storage is chosen according to the random fit method.
      class  SfPlacementPolicyWorstFit
      A placement policy that chooses the storage that has enough capacity for the storage file.
      The storage is chosen according to the worst fit method.

    • Uses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.service.vmplacement

      Subclasses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.service.vmplacement 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  VmPlacementPolicyAbstract 
      class  VmPlacementPolicyBestFit
      A placement policy that chooses the host that has enough resources for the virtual machine among all available and powered on hosts.
      The host is chosen according to the best fit method.
      If none is found then a new host is powered on.
      class  VmPlacementPolicyFirstFit
      A placement policy that chooses the host that has enough resources for the virtual machine among all available and powered on hosts.
      The host is chosen according to the first fit method.
      If none is found then a new host is powered on.
      class  VmPlacementPolicyRandomFit
      A placement policy that chooses the host that has enough resources for the virtual machine among all available and powered on hosts.
      The host is chosen according to the random fit method.
      If none is found then a new host is powered on.
      class  VmPlacementPolicyWorstFit
      A placement policy that chooses the host that has enough resources for the virtual machine among all available and powered on hosts.
      The host is chosen according to the worst fit method.
      If none is found then a new host is powered on.

    • Uses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation

      Subclasses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LongOperationImpl<Resource extends LongResource>
      This is the default implementation of the LongOperation interface.
      class  OperationImpl<Resource> 
      class  SynchronizableLongOperationImpl<Resource extends LongResource>
      A LongOperationImpl that implements the SynchronizableOperation interface.
      class  TimerOperation
      A operation that runs for a given delay, then becomes completed.

    • Uses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation.provisioner

      Subclasses of EntityImpl in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation.provisioner 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FairProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner ensures fair distribution of the available capacity through running operations.
      class  FastFairProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner gives promises that are equal to the average capacity computed by considering all running operations that use this provisioner.
      When resources are granted (or revoked) for (from) a operation, then other running operations are notified that they can use more (or less) resources (see NotificationCodes.OPERATION_RESOURCE_INVALIDATED).
      class  InfiniteProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner always give resource promises with a value of Long.MAX_VALUE.
      class  LongProvisionerImpl<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource> 
      class  StaticProvisioner<OperationType extends Operation<Resource>,Resource extends LongResource>
      This provisioner gives promises that are equal to its current free capacity.
      It will also ensure that any granted resource will not be invalidated even if new capacity is freed.
